rows.label: bf11390100_0010
rows.name:
Nice moves, Laura. Even when I see you
coming, you counter in an instant.

rows.label: bf11390100_0015
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]adlib swordfighting

rows.label: bf11390100_0020
rows.name:
That's only thanks to the power
of the Second Sword, Kasumi.

rows.label: bf11390100_0030
rows.name:
And you're not even using
Hikari's "trump card," are you?

rows.label: bf11390100_0040
rows.name: And what if I did?

rows.label: bf11390100_0050
rows.name: Then...

rows.label: bf11390100_0060
rows.name: we'd have to use the "First Sword."

rows.label: bf11390100_0070
rows.name: Adel-sama...

rows.label: bf11390100_0080
rows.name: Dinner is ready.

rows.label: bf11390100_0090
rows.name: Is it that time already?

rows.label: bf11390100_0100
rows.name:
The days are so long this time of year,
it's easy to lose track of time.

rows.label: bf11390100_0110
rows.name:
Oh, training's over already?
Too bad, I wanted to join in.

rows.label: bf11390100_0120
rows.name: You're late. Are you alone?

rows.label: bf11390100_0130
rows.name:
His Majesty is always busy. I'm
used to acting on my own anyway.

rows.label: bf11390100_0140
rows.name:
A Driver and Blade are two halves of a whole.
That's how it's supposed to be, right?

rows.label: bf11390100_0150
rows.name: You can't use your full power otherwise.

rows.label: bf11390100_0160
rows.name: It's easier said than done.

rows.label: bf11390100_0170
rows.name:
I still can't draw out
all of your power.

rows.label: bf11390100_0180
rows.name:
You think so? I feel like
I'm already at my limit.

rows.label: bf11390100_0190
rows.name:
It just means your
potential is bottomless.

rows.label: bf11390100_0200
rows.name:
Still, Kasumi's ability to
restrain a Blade's power...

rows.label: bf11390100_0210
rows.name:
It's perfect for training.
Really helps a lot.

rows.label: bf11390100_0220
rows.name:
It even limits my Causality
Prediction. It's a real pain.

rows.label: bf11390100_0230
rows.name:
Oh my... To receive such praise from Adel-sama
and Hikari-sama, I am truly humbled.

rows.label: bf11390100_0240
rows.name:
Looking at you two now,
you could be twins.

rows.label: bf11390100_0250
rows.name:
It's rare for a Blade to reflect its
Driver's traits so strongly, right?

rows.label: bf11390100_0260
rows.name:
I've heard stories like
that, but is it really?

rows.label: bf11390100_0270
rows.name: Who knows...

rows.label: bf11390100_0280
rows.name:
But for my part, I'm happy that I was
born looking just like Laura-sama.

rows.label: bf11390100_0290
rows.name: We can even share clothes.

rows.label: bf11390100_0300
rows.name: Indeed.

rows.label: bf11390100_0310
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]

rows.label: bf11390100_0320
rows.name: By the way...

rows.label: bf11390100_0330
rows.name: I'd like to spar with you next, Shin.

rows.label: bf11390100_0340
rows.name: Well? How about it Shin?

rows.label: bf11390100_0350
rows.name: I'm not fond of fighting.

rows.label: bf11390100_0360
rows.name:
Coming from "the strongest man in Iira,"
those words carry a lot of weight.

rows.label: bf11390100_0370
rows.name: Perhaps that is the truth of it...

rows.label: bf11390100_0380
rows.name: He... No...

rows.label: bf11390100_0390
rows.name: ...they...

rows.label: bf11390100_0400
rows.name:
Adel-sama, Laura-sama! We know
what Metsu is targeting!

rows.label: bf11390100_0410
rows.name: It is the Royal Capital.

rows.label: bf11390100_0420
rows.name: Are you sure?

rows.label: bf11390100_0430
rows.name: Yes! There is no mistake!
